text: quick recommendation for anyone hoping to try this but is new to React, The complete intro and intermediate React courses by Brian Holt on <http://frontendmasters.com|frontendmasters.com> have been a huge help for me.
Will we eventually have access to `vite.config.js`? I haven't really needed access until now but for testing I'd like to try `happy-dom`  instead of `jsdom`

I think you can do this now, <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-js-building-blocks-hello-world/tree/main/hello-world-project/cms-assets> has an example for local testing, but feel free to use other tools.
The dev dependency on `jsdom` could be replaced in your environment with `happy-dom` and then you could update your local `vitest.config.js` to use that package.
